name: org.openrewrite.groovy.format.AutoFormat
description: Format Groovy code using a standard comprehensive set of Groovy formatting recipes.

name: org.openrewrite.groovy.format.GStringCurlyBraces
description: In Groovy [GStrings](https://docs.groovy-lang.org/latest/html/api/groovy/lang/GString.html), curly braces are optional for single variable expressions. This recipe adds them, so that the expression is always surrounded by curly braces.

name: org.openrewrite.groovy.format.OmitParenthesesForLastArgumentLambda
displayName: Move a closure which is the last argument of a method invocation out of parentheses
description: Groovy allows a shorthand syntax that allows a closure to be placed outside of parentheses.

name: org.openrewrite.groovy.format.OmitParenthesesFormat
displayName: Stylize Groovy code to omit parentheses
description: Omit parentheses for last argument lambdas in Groovy code.
